reasoning: This task adds two features to an existing React/TypeScript desktop app: (1) a hierarchical file explorer component for browsing activity taxonomy, and (2) enhanced autofill functionality. Both the taxonomy system and the learning/enrichment engine already exist in the codebase - the work involves creating a new UI component and wiring up existing backend logic. Estimated 6-8 files modified within a single service.

scope.notes: New TaxonomyExplorer component + modifications to App.tsx sidebar + possible enhancements to enricher integration. All contained within desktop app at insight/mayor/rig/apps/desktop/src/

integrations.notes: No external integrations. The taxonomy system (taxonomy/starter.ts, taxonomy/rules.ts) and learning engine (learning/enricher.ts) already exist. Just need to connect them to UI.

infrastructure.notes: Pure frontend UI changes. IndexedDB-based local storage already in place. No infrastructure modifications needed.

knowledge.notes: Codebase has clear patterns: React components with TypeScript, existing sidebar structure (see screenshot 1), taxonomy types in taxonomy/starter.ts (StarterTaxonomy with category/subcategory arrays), enricher in learning/enricher.ts. Tree/collapsible patterns already used in sidebar (PINNED, RECENT NOTES sections).

concerns: Must integrate seamlessly with existing sidebar layout
Autofill should not override user's manual selections
risk.notes: Low risk - additive feature building on existing foundations. Auto-fill button already exists (App.tsx:6717), just needs enhanced logic. The enricher has confidence thresholds (AUTO_APPLY_THRESHOLD) to prevent aggressive overwriting.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: New UI component and event autofill logic changes require unit tests for component rendering and integration tests for the autofill flow. No auth/security implications. No database schema changes.

implementation_hints.file_explorer: Create new TaxonomyExplorer component in src/ui/ with collapsible tree structure. Use existing StarterTaxonomy type. Place in left sidebar where screenshots show 'Vault' section.
implementation_hints.autofill_enhancement: Auto-fill buttons exist at App.tsx:6717 and :7459. Currently use inferCategorySubcategoryLoose. Should integrate learning/enricher.ts enrichEvent() function for pattern-based autofill with confidence scoring.
implementation_hints.data_structure: Taxonomy is hierarchical: Category > Subcategory (e.g., Personal > Health > Cardio). Use STARTER_TAXONOMY from taxonomy/starter.ts.
